description: Molien series of 3 X 3 upper triangular matrices over GF( 3 ).
comments: Number of partitions of n into parts 1, 3 or 9. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 12 2011
references: D. J. Benson, Polynomial Invariants of Finite Groups, Cambridge, 1993, p. 105.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 219
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
